org.numenta.nupic.research

Class Connections

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.research.Connections

  • public class Connections
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the definition of the interconnected structural state of the TemporalMemory as well as the state of all support structures (i.e. Cells, Columns, Segments, Synapses etc.)
